name: Dozy Dieter
description:
Dozy Dieter is a very short Point and Click Adventure Game. 

It features about 20-30 minutes of (hopefully, at least a bit) humorous gameplay and narrative based puzzles. 

Dieter is a tourist who arrives to his apartment and desperately wants to go to sleep but there is a band right outside playing loud music. 

Made in about 2 months by:

Aleksandar Vojnić - all the technical stuff

Danijela Milanović - all the artsy-fartsy stuff

Music:

"Modern Jazz Samba" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"No Frills Cumbia" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Beachfront Celebration" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Lullaby": Music by JuliusH from Pixabay
